INVESTIGATION FORCES: OPERATION ZERO
I.F: Operation Zero will be a horror and puzzle-solving game.
I.F: Operation Zero will have Singleplayer mode where the goal will be to investigate some of the urban stories (e.g Slender).

Updates:
https://steamcommunity.com/app/1172040
The mode of puzzles that will have the name “Operation Zero” is a cooperative game of max. 2 players, in this mode you will live the same horror with references to the singleplayer (campaign) but more complicated because the goal is to escape certain zones divided into levels, you will have to count with multiple doors and several hours to pass a level with your friend.
